short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ERP Connector acts as a medium that helps to establish connections between the ERP applications and the Opkey portal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ERP Connector acts as a medium to connect between the Salesforce application and the Opkey portal. It helps connect a specific ID of that particular environment with the Salesforce application. The Connect to ORG  tab will let the user select any settings and proceed with the Next Button. It will fetch the complete data as well as snapshots from the Salesforce Application. To view the fetched data from the Salesforce Application, users will have to launch the ERP Connector. To view what percentage of data is impacted and other details, users will have to look at the Salesforce applications injected page. A side tab will display all the details of Object Name, Risk Analysis, Impacted percentage based on field, and Opkey Test Coverage.
